title: Bojack Horseman
description: A humanoid horse, struggling with addiction and depression, navigates the ups and downs of life in Hollywood.

title: Big Mouth
description: Teenagers navigate the horrors and awkwardness of puberty with the help of hormone monsters.

title: Castlevania
description: A vampire hunter fights to save a town from an army of demons controlled by Count Dracula.

title: Tuca & Bertie
description: Two anthropmorphic bird women in their 30s navigate friendship, work, and romance.

title: The Dragon Prince
description: Two human princes and an elven assassin team up to stop an evil warlord from starting a war.

title: Love, Death & Robots
description: An anthology of animated short stories that span various genres, each exploring different aspects of human nature.

title: The Midnight Gospel
description: A spacecaster travels through bizarre worlds to interview beings about life, death, and everything in between.

title: BoJack Horseman
description: An animated series that follows BoJack, a washed-up actor who's trying to make a comeback while battling his own personal demons.

title: Disenchantment
description: A princess, her elf companion, and a feisty but lovable ogre navigate the magical world of Dreamland.

title: Final Space
description: An astronaut embarks on an intergalactic journey to save the universe while making new friends and enemies.

title: Kipo and the Age of the Wonderbeasts
description: A young girl survives in a world overrun by mutant animals and seeks to reunite with her father.

title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
description: Adora transforms into She-Ra, a mighty warrior who must unite a group of princesses to fight an evil empire.

title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
description: Six teenagers are stranded on Isla Nublar during the events of Jurassic World and must survive against the dinosaurs.

title: Castlevania: Nocturne
description: A continuation of the popular Castlevania series with new characters and epic adventures set in the vampire-filled world.

title: The Cuphead Show!
description: The wild and whimsical adventures of Cuphead and Mugman, inspired by the 1930s cartoon style.
